summary: Hardware rerun could not start because the Codex sandbox lacks the required gate-runner toolchain (python -m build, docker, SoX, FFmpeg, aria2c, pytest-cov) and has no network route to gate-runner-02.

notes: Gate hardware provisioning requires root access to gate-runner-02 and outbound network access, neither of which are available inside the sandbox container.
System-level tool installations are not possible within the review sandbox session, leaving the hardware mirror unprovisioned.
